title: Round the island
creator_credit: Tony Thompson, Ian Ferguson and British Transport Films
brief_description: The Isle of Wight and its many attractions. The long established farms on the Downs; the ferry to the mainland; Uffa Fox, the famous yachtsman, comments on his love of the sea and is seen sailing in a race; inside a lighthouse; Tennyson’s home; Osborne House; a trip round trhe island to Carisbrooke Castle; the quiet villages, and ancient boatyards. Scenes of the Cowes Regatta, with some of the races and the gaiety in town and harbour.
